instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.D6990: What is D6990? Diode sitting between PPBUS_G3H/PP18V5 charger voltage and PP3V42_G3H power supply input, can die and cause PP3V42_G3H to be missing and have no input voltage. .
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.U7000: What is U7000? U7000 refers to the ISL6258 or ISL6259 charging IC on Macbooks from 2008-2012.
definitions.R7051: What is R7051? Current sense resistor between battery current sense shunt resistor and ISL6259. When these resistors fail the ISL6259 cannot gauge how much current is being sent to or drawn from the battery, which will cause the ISL6259 to stop drawing/sending power to the battery as a safety precaution. Symptoms are low voltage on PPBUS_G3H, quarter fan spin, boot looping, or battery not charging..
definitions.R7052: What is R7052? Current sense resistor between battery current sense shunt resistor and ISL6259. When these resistors fail the ISL6259 cannot gauge how much current is being sent to or drawn from the battery, which will cause the ISL6259 to stop drawing/sending power to the battery as a safety precaution. Symptoms are low voltage on PPBUS_G3H, quarter fan spin, boot looping, or battery not charging..
definitions.ADAPTER_EN: What is ADAPTER_EN? SMC_ADAPTER_EN enables the machine to work off of the power adapter when the proper power adapter is attached. Attacching an 85w Macbook Pro 15” power adapter to a 13” Macbook that requires a 60w power adapter is ok, attaching a 45w Macbook Air power adapter to a 15” macbook Pro that needs an 85w power adapter will result in SMC_ADAPTER_EN missing. .
definitions.SMC_ADAPTER_EN: What is SMC_ADAPTER_EN? SMC_ADAPTER_EN enables the machine to work off of the power adapter when the proper power adapter is attached. Attacching an 85w Macbook Pro 15” power adapter to a 13” Macbook that requires a 60w power adapter is ok, attaching a 45w Macbook Air power adapter to a 15” macbook Pro that needs an 85w power adapter will result in SMC_ADAPTER_EN missing. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
threads.message:
water damage?, coke spill in november

green light, fan spin, no chime with charger plugged in,
no charger, running off battery, boot with folder icon
plug in charger, disconnect battery, folder icon remains
after running for 5 mins weird smell
no apparant corrosion

scratching my head, checked one wire, seems ok checked <DIODE>D6990</DIODE> and <CHIP>U6990</CHIP>, seems ok

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
threads.message: Got green light, does it charge? PPBUS present on charger? Check for heat if something smells funny.

12v on ppvbat
20v on dcin
nothing getting warm

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
threads.message: 12V? Need more digits. Does it charge the battery? Orange light? Not using a 45W charger by accident?

threads.message:

something strange,without the battery plugged in the voltage out of the battery connector is 3v something, 
when the battery is plugged in it starts charging 11.5v going up past 12.06
orange light is on

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
threads.message: The battery connector is not PPBUS, need PPBUS......You sure it is not a Chinese shit charger?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
threads.message:
geniune charger, again, I only have genuine chargers
ok starting with the battery plugged in first and then plugging in the charger to turn it on
<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> 12.03v   ppbat 12.06 orrange light
unplug charger 
ppbus 10.97v ppbat 10.95v
plug back in charger, unplug battery 
ppbus 0.227 ppbat 12.61

Im trying to give you as much info as I can because I have to wait 24 hours to get a message back, I will measure what you want measured

threads.message: Did you check the basics around <CHIP>U7000</CHIP>? Resistance between pins 17/18 27/28 etc.?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
threads.message:
Lets get some new measurements now. 

Voltage on PPBUS without battery connected?
<SIGNAL>ADAPTER_EN</SIGNAL> present?

Do you get an orange light when battery connected?

threads.message: ive reflowed the smc and now i get a fan spin, no chime, no green light, turns off using power button, wont turn on using power button, only cable in, i thought this was one of the models that didnt turn on then the charger was plugged in, turns off after like 30 seconds of being plugged in

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> alain, weird issue,  no power on with charger but will run off charger
threads.message: So SMC got messed up, probably still glue under it. Pull and reball or replace.
